@graph.text: How do you eat your cookies?

headline: Best Homemade Chocolate Chip Cookies
name: Best Homemade Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipeInstructions: Preheat oven to 375º and line a large baking sheet with parchment paper. Using an electric mixer, beat butter and sugars until light and fluffy, about 2 minutes. Slowly beat in vanilla extract and eggs.  In a separate bowl, mix flour, baking soda and salt. Stir into butter-sugar mixture. Fold in chocolate chips. Roll dough into 1-inch balls, placing them about 2 inches apart on prepared baking sheet. Bake cookies for 10 to 12 minutes, or until lightly golden.

video.name: 5 Secrets To Baking Perfect Chocolate Chip Cookies!

review.reviewBody: These cookies were delicious !!I loved them!!

Delicious! The cookies came out so soft and chewy! My family loved them! I’m almost certainly gonna make this recipe again!  FYI, the recipe definitely makes more than 24 cookies although the cookies I made weren’t very big so that could explain why I made over 40 cookies! 😊

I made these today for Easter. When I bite into them they taste a bit odd like it’s missing something. But when we start eating it, it starts to taste good. It’s weird but that’s how it turned out. BUT I had salted butter instead of unsalted and I used light brown sugar. So that could have altered the taste a bit but I was just using what I already had at home
I made them into muffins and my kids loved them for their birthdays and I would totally use them for any occasion

This recipe works best with patience.  Butter is an absolute must, but to make the cookies taste even better, remember sifting, and to make it easier, use the wire whisk attachment on your mixer.  I was given this tip by a friend of mine who makes fantastic cookies.  Add all of the dry ingredients to your mixer FIRST (I have a KitchenAid), and let it whisk (sift) for a few minutes.  I also used parchment paper on my pans, which means no need to oil your pan, and baked them for 9 minutes.  My whole family was raving about them when they were done, and they tasted even better the next day!
The cream cheese idea sounds fascinating.  If anyone has tried, let me know what you think!

WOW! These are the best cookies I’ve ever had. My hubby ate like 6 before dinner! Next time, I’m going to do 1 cp of peanut butter chips and 1 cp of chocolate chips. But only because my husband suggested it, and it just sounds Delish! Thanks for the recipe!! I already wrote it down. Worthy of my recipe box!! 🤤
The cookies tasted good. But the cookies looked a little pale and the cookies are a little taller than it should be (probably due to excess flour).
I emded up with a delicious cookie sheet. They spread way more than most the cookie recipes I've used.
This was delish would have been better if we had vanilla...

description: The easiest and best recipe for a classic Chocolate Chip Cookie.
